use_cases_desc:
Video browsing
Navigation tasks
browsing large data sets
collaborations
multi-layer information presentation
evaluation: User study (quantitative, controlled lab experiment); initial sessions
contribution_desc: SAMMI, a spatially aware multi-device interface to assist with analytic map navigation tasks, where, in addition to browsing the workspace, the user has to make a decision based on the content embedded in the map.
interaction_techniques: UI distribution; Visualisation; Data exploration; Cross-device task chaining
tracking_tech: Marker-based IR Tracking; only used for experiment, not part of design
